snippet: The artistic director of the new Madison Theater at Molloy College, which will provide a home for the South Shore Symphony, plans an ambitious and varied program.
abstract: Angelo Fraboni, artistic director of the Madison Theater at Molloy College in Rockville Centre, NY, which will provide a home for the South Shore Symphony, has planned an ambitious and varied program (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The artistic director of the new Madison Theater at Molloy College, which will provide a home for the South Shore Symphony, plans an ambitious and varied program.

headline.seo: At the New Madison Theater in Rockville Center, Ambitious Beginnings
headline.main: At a New Theater, Ambitious and Varied Beginnings
headline.print_headline: At a New Theater, Ambitious and Varied Beginnings
